attributes.action: Allow socially distanced golf for mental and physical health reasons.
attributes.additional_details:
We would like Parliament to consider the easing of golfing restrictions enough to allow players to play. The clubhouse should be closed, but the Professional should be allowed to open the course shop, so to police the footfall. 
The idea would be for 2 balls to be allowed to book a Tee time with 15 minute intervals so that the players don’t meet in the car park or around the course. 
This would assist with the mental and physical health of many.
attributes.background: Allow a system during Covid19 lockdown, where 2 people can play at a time, on pre-booked Tee times, and the only function of the club would be to allow players to play. No ancillary services would be required at this point.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced that golf courses in England can re-open. 

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
